attributes.action: Cease the organised dismantling and wrecking of British farming.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This has been 'hidden' Government policy since they agreed it with EU representatives in Brussels in 1998. In the meantime they caused maximum damage in the F&M epidemic - and now sponsor additional outbreaks via crumbling plumbing and toxic leakages at their so called "research" establishments. The ONLY reason they refuse vaccination of  animals is because they know they WORK!
and minimise losses.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
